name: Honey on the Slaughter: Entrance to Oblivion
name_original: Honey on the Slaughter: Entrance to Oblivion
description:
Buddy is kicking up trouble down at Oblivion square, but unlike last time, Dr. Ogglepoth has prepared some countermeasures.

Rip and blast your way through hordes of Devious Enemies and Destructive Mini-bosses and even take down the Mad Dr himself with a huge arsenal of assorted weapons and your fury powers!

Can you get the Ultimate high score?

Accessible for keyboard and gamepad.

Xbox Gamepad Controls: 

Y - Sprint.  B - Switch Weapons.  X - Fury blast. Triggers - Shoot.

THE BONUS GAME STEEL REiGIX IS AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD.

Drive an armored vehicle, controller compatible.

Unzip and run the HTML

 SOURCE FILES COMING SOON!
